node.statement: For the first term: d/dt Tr[rho(t) log rho(t)] = Tr[delta_AB log rho(t)] + Tr[rho(t) D_log(rho(t))[delta_AB]]. By the identity Tr[B D_log(B)[C]] = Tr[C] for B > 0 (which follows from the integral representation D_log(B)[C] = integral_0^infty (B+sI)^{-1} C (B+sI)^{-1} ds and cyclicity of trace), the second part with B = rho(t) > 0 (by node 1.1) and C = delta_AB gives Tr[delta_AB] = 0 (since delta_AB = sigma_AB - rho_AB is traceless, both being partial traces of density matrices). So d/dt Tr[rho(t) log rho(t)] = Tr[delta_AB log rho(t)].
